start: <h2>The City of Plunsed</h2><span class="first-character">P</span>lunsed is a <span class="tip dotted" title="With a population of 6090.">city</span> located in the arid oasis, where the vegetation is lush. Plunsed grew around a large oasis of water, and is comprised <span class="tip dotted" title=" Human: 57.52%, Dwarf: 14.04%, Half-Elf: 8.96%, Gnome: 6.84%, Halfling: 5.59%, Elf: 2.33%, Dragonborn: 1.57%, Goblin: 1.18%, Half-Orc: 1.00%, Tiefling: 0.96%">mostly of humans, with some dwarves</span>. They are a <span class="tip dotted" title="Men occupy most positions of authority.">patriarchal</span>  <span class="tip dotted" title="Trade and industry are controlled by private owners for profit, rather than the state.">capitalist</span> <span class="tip dotted" title="Governed by one person.">autocratic</span> <span class="tip dotted" title="The crown holds supreme judicial powers, but executive power is held by the prime minister.">constitutional monarchy</span>.<br><span class="tip" title="Find the overview of the town and its sociopolitical structure here!"><a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Description of Plunsed</a></span><br><br><span id="buildings"><br>    On  <span class="tip dotted" title="Cross Track is a path-sized dirt and gypsum track. It is made of dirt that has been packed down. Unfortunately, it was done a long time ago, and is deteriorating slightly. There's some native plants growing along the side of the track. The road's name comes from Immeral Cross, a half-elf who lived in Plunsed for many, many years, maintaining the oral history.">Cross Track</span> is <span class="tip" id="c536b7cb-d4af-42e8-bfb9-958929c0418f"><span class="tip" id="c536b7cb-d4af-42e8-bfb9-958929c0418f"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Town Square</a></span></span><br>    Over on  <span class="tip dotted" title="Fargrim Road is a path-sized gravel and hewn rock road. It is made of poorly packed gravel, which shifts around under foot. A crude drawing of an animal carved into a brick wall, affectionately labeled “R.E. Was here.” The road was named after Fargrim Eversharp, who was a dwarf who bought the naming rights to the road.">Fargrim Road</span> is <span class="tip" id="39bd9559-1760-4447-ac5b-c68a8a4c6f31"><span class="tip" id="39bd9559-1760-4447-ac5b-c68a8a4c6f31"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Fargrim Road Bazaar</a></span></span><br>    On  <span class="tip dotted" title="Potter Lane is a path-sized dirt and gypsum lane. It is made of dirt that has been packed down. Unfortunately, it was done a long time ago, and is deteriorating slightly. There is a table with a pitcher of water out the front of one of the houses. ">Potter Lane</span> is <span class="tip" id="fe713726-ddae-44f8-9958-f6d35ed4244b"><span class="tip" id="fe713726-ddae-44f8-9958-f6d35ed4244b"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Smiting Fox and the Treasure</a></span></span><br>    Over on  <span class="tip dotted" title="Tailor Lane is a rather narrow dirt and gypsum lane. It is made of dirt that has been packed down. There is a table with a pitcher of water out the front of one of the houses. ">Tailor Lane</span> is <span class="tip" id="d16ea180-db0d-4256-b8ca-25c1dbce9a5f"><span class="tip" id="d16ea180-db0d-4256-b8ca-25c1dbce9a5f"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Pie in the Sky</a></span></span><br>    On  <span class="tip dotted" title="Keep Boulevard is a wide dirt and gypsum road. It is two thin lines of dirt road with grass growing around and in between them. There's a wagon with a cracked wheel by the side of the road. ">Keep Boulevard</span> is <span class="tip" id="817b6b72-a580-45a4-bf3e-673a6bdf0ca3"><span class="tip" id="817b6b72-a580-45a4-bf3e-673a6bdf0ca3"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Hall's Keep</a></span></span><br>    Over on  <span class="tip dotted" title="Gross Close is a  dirt and gypsum cul-de-sac. It is a desire path, with the grass just gently trodden down. A crude drawing of an animal carved into a brick wall, affectionately labeled “R.E. Was here.” The name comes from Masyn Gross, a human who produced a staggering 13 children.">Gross Close</span> is <span class="tip" id="885e84be-c4db-4b40-8d84-38919eb739c6"><span class="tip" id="885e84be-c4db-4b40-8d84-38919eb739c6"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Happy Needle</a></span></span><br>    On  <span class="tip dotted" title="Tealeaf Street is a broad dirt and gypsum street. It is made of dirt that has been packed down. A crude drawing of an animal carved into a brick wall, affectionately labeled “R.E. Was here.” The road was named after Keith Tealeaf, who was a very respected local who was captured in war, but did not reveal any secrets while being tortured.">Tealeaf Street</span> is <span class="tip" id="cf970c1d-b6a6-4bcd-83ef-962b320ce71c"><span class="tip" id="cf970c1d-b6a6-4bcd-83ef-962b320ce71c"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Plunsed Butcher Shop</a></span></span><br>    Over on  <span class="tip dotted" title="North Road is a rather wide dirt and gypsum road. It is two thin lines of dirt road with grass growing around and in between them. There's a bench on the side of the road, with the wood being smoothed out from many sittings. ">North Road</span> is <span class="tip" id="47e9d2a6-5ab4-4bca-b30c-b7be2d97bf0f"><span class="tip" id="47e9d2a6-5ab4-4bca-b30c-b7be2d97bf0f"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Discount Bazaar</a></span></span></span><br><br><a data-passage="OutputEverything" class="link-internal" tabindex="0">OutputEverything</a><br>
town: <br><span class="first-character">P</span>lunsed is located in the arid oasis, where the vegetation is lush. Plunsed grew around a large oasis of water. They harvest potatoes and leeks, and nearby is a region rich with emerald deposits.They are a <span class="tip dotted" title="Trade and industry are controlled by private owners for profit, rather than the state.">capitalist</span> <span class="tip dotted" title="Governed by one person.">autocratic</span> <span class="tip dotted" title="The crown holds supreme judicial powers, but executive power is held by the prime minister.">constitutional monarchy</span>. The nearest <span class="tip" title="This changes each time you click."><a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">landmark</a></span> is <span id="random">something about the weather of this place makes it rain perpetually.</span> A population of 6090, the denizens live a comfortable existence. A holy day is currently taking place.<br><h3>Government in Plunsed</h3>The people of Plunsed work in exchange for payment from their employers, which they use to buy the necessities. Mr <span class="tip" id="c79923f6-c7af-4e11-89c1-0516453b97ff"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Oewyn Burnside</a></span> is technically the head of state, but affairs are handled by the prime minister, <span class="tip" id="2ada790f-2e0b-4c04-bc42-65312c373fac"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Aramil March</a></span>, who controls all executive decisions.<br><h4>Economics</h4>Trade in Plunsed is regulated, with taxes applied to all goods and services rendered, and people live a comfortable existence because of it. The trade guild enforces rules, with penalties for rule-breakers. Welfare is bad. Citizens can expect the bare minimum of death services. Healthcare and education are fringe cases, and citizens would do better to seek a private benefactor than try and receive treatment from the government. <h4>Law and Order</h4>The Plunsed Distributors are very strict, with citizens being forced to carry licenses and travel permits. The law is enforced by <span class="tip" id="b222814c-a23d-48e7-9f66-4472f87f2920"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Plunsed Distributors</a></span>, who are well armed, and brutality is common.' Law in Plunsed is punitive, and those that breach the laws can expect hard labor, incarceration, fines, or, in rare instances, execution. Magic is reviled by the guards, and they look for any excuse to put away a magic user. It is coded into law as a restricted activity, so they have an easy time of doing it, too.<br><span class="macro-linkappend"><h3>Racial Demographics</h3></span> <div class="classTable" id="races"><span class="macro-live macro-live-block">Plunsed is comprised mostly of humans, with some dwarves</span>.  <table>     <tr>         <th>Race</th>         <th>Population</th> c536b7cb-d4af-42e8-bfb9-958929c0418f.name: The Town Square
c536b7cb-d4af-42e8-bfb9-958929c0418f.output: <h1>The Town Square</h1><br>You're in the town square. It's large and bustling, and overflowing with refuse and other garbage. It features a large unlit stake surrounded by kindling. As you enter the town square, you see <span class="tip" id="d093cf91-6d05-4301-8f91-cf64db4d468d"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">an unbelievably large female dwarf</a></span> who is pushing through the square with an oddly shaped parcel in hand.<br>There's a <span class="tip" id="2a8fac2f-b650-4b17-83d7-cf5661730f78"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">overweight human</a></span> who calls out to you, and says "You look lost. Do you know your way around the city? I can guide you, for just  5 Silver". <blockquote>She will lead the players down an alley where her compatriots will attempt to rob the players.</blockquote> There's also a noticeboard, which has various posters, requests, and announcements tacked to it.<br><br><br><br><span class="macro-live macro-live-block"><div id="poster"></div></span>

39bd9559-1760-4447-ac5b-c68a8a4c6f31.name: The Fargrim Road bazaar
39bd9559-1760-4447-ac5b-c68a8a4c6f31.output: You wander through the streets of Plunsed, and come across the market, which is located in a sprawling maze of tunnels beneath the city streets. It seems that the vendors are organised by who bribed the market runners the most for the month. The market is known for being a pickpocketing hotspot, and is a victim to the chaos that is so common in markets. Today the market is decently busy, and several people are going between shops examining all the different merchandise.<br><br><h3>Merchants</h3> <br>Nearby, a  <span class="tip" id="b3689cd6-95bb-44d9-a29e-96039689152b"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">earlyish thirties half-elf</a></span> is calling "Luxury leather carriage seats! Keep your seat sweet! This bargain can't be beat!" from a semi-permanent wooden stall.<br><br>A  <span class="tip" id="29b6ee74-e836-4b81-868b-60683aa45de8"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">quite fat human</a></span> is selling woven baskets from a group of flat stones with merchandise piled on them.<br><br>Nearby, a  <span class="tip" id="f016a588-061f-4fb4-9c1b-1036a3bc7e38"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">skinny human</a></span> is selling hand painted pottery from a large rug on which the vendor has laid out the merchandise.<br><br>Nearby, a  <span class="tip" id="be27c1fa-c266-4882-9356-eb330b2c2c36"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">young adult elf</a></span> is calling to any who would listen: "Gargoyles with breasts engraved on them! Be the big cheese on your block!" from a ramshackle storefront.<br><br><br><br>

fe713726-ddae-44f8-9958-f6d35ed4244b.name: The Smiting Fox and the Treasure

d16ea180-db0d-4256-b8ca-25c1dbce9a5f.name: Pie in the Sky
d16ea180-db0d-4256-b8ca-25c1dbce9a5f.output: <br><span class="first-character">Y</span>ou come off the street into Pie in the Sky, a shabby gypsum building with a decently built red shingled roof. You notice a large embroidery bread loaf hanging on a wall.<br><br>This bakeshop is known for being the bakery that catered the most recent royal wedding. There is a <span class="tip" id="f314d4e5-3594-4734-8aa5-daaac341a8f1"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">short woman with a spider web tattoo</a></span> currently icing a small cake. She welcomes you, and asks what you are after.<br><br><div id="pastry"></div><br><br>	 	 	 	<table> 		<tr> 			<th>Goods</th> 			<th>Cost</th> 		</tr> 		 			 				 				 			 			 				 				 				<tr> 					<td> 					 							 	 	<span class="tip dotted" title="A loaf of rye bread.">Loaf of rye bread</span>  					 					</td> 					<td> 1 Silver 5 Copper</td> 				</tr> 		 			 				 			 			 				 				 				<tr> 					<td> 					 							 	 	<span class="tip dotted" title="A dense and difficult to digest loaf. Typically used as a plate for meats, with the juices soaking into the bread to make it more palatable.">Unleavened bread</span>  					 					</td> 					<td> 4 Copper</td> 				</tr> 		 			 				 				 			 			 				 				 				<tr> 					<td> 					 							 	 	<span class="tip dotted" title="A loaf of barley bread.">Loaf of barley bread</span>  					 					</td> 					<td> 1 Silver 8 Copper</td> 				</tr> 		 			 				 				 			 			 			 				 				 			 			 				 				 				<tr> 					<td> 					 							 	 	<span class="tip dotted" title="Small, round, golden looking pucks of some kind of baked grains. It feels invigorating to eat, and keeps you full all day.">Elven biscuits</span>  					 					</td> 					<td> 1 Silver 5 Copper</td> 				</tr> 		 			 				 			 			 				 				 				<tr> 					<td> 					 							 	 	<span class="tip dotted" title="A stale loaf. Not very appetizing.">Stale bread</span>  					 					</td> 					<td> 4 Copper</td> 				</tr> 		 			 				 			 			 				 				 				<tr> 					<td> 					 							 	 	<span class="tip dotted" title="A loaf sliced and then baked a second time, biscuits last for a long time.">Biscuit loaf</span>  					 					</td> 					<td> 9 Copper</td> 				</tr> 		 			 				 				 			 			 				 				 				<tr> 					<td> 					 							 	 	<span class="tip dotted" title="A tasty looking fruit tart.">Sweet tart</span>  					 					</td> 					<td> 1 Silver 3 Copper</td> 				</tr> 		 			 				 				 			 			 	</table> 	<br>

885e84be-c4db-4b40-8d84-38919eb739c6.name: The Happy Needle

You notice several buckets of blood sitting on tables behind the counter.<br><br>This butcher shop is known for raising their own livestock for slaughter. There is a <span class="tip" id="60e115b5-5fa8-415c-80f4-0697490c8c86"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">young adult human</a></span> currently thinly slicing some meats. 47e9d2a6-5ab4-4bca-b30c-b7be2d97bf0f.name: The Discount Bazaar
47e9d2a6-5ab4-4bca-b30c-b7be2d97bf0f.output: \<div id="illustration-buffer"><img id="illustration" src="./src/Resources/general-store-illustration.jpg"></div><img id="paper" src="./src/Resources/0001.png" top="15vw" display="block"><br><span class="first-character">Y</span>ou make your way down <span class="tip dotted" title="North Road is a rather wide dirt and gypsum road. It is two thin lines of dirt road with grass growing around and in between them. There's a bench on the side of the road, with the wood being smoothed out from many sittings. ">North Road</span>, and enter a shabby gypsum shop with a straw roof and see that inside, the somewhat cramped building is tidy. You notice constables of the local guard, The Plunsed Distributors are interviewing everyone in the shop. The store's shopkeep is currently reading a book titled ''.<br><br><h3>Shopkeeper</h3><br>The shopkeep nods at you while you look around. She introduces herself as <span class="tip" id="6ae453a0-f314-4fda-aa57-91bc0b4259f9"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Buvvie Miggledy</a></span>, the proud owner of the General Store, and lets you know that the store is currently having a three for one deal. Buvvie is a rather useless salesperson who knows very little about the shop merchandise.<br><br><b><a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0"><h4>Buy a magic trinket</h4></a></b><span id="Trinket"></span><br><span class="macro-linkappend"><h4>Buy something</h4></span><div class="descriptive">    Buvvie Miggledy smiles, and says "You're looking to buy something? Name it, here at The Discount Bazaar, we stock everything the average man could possibly need!   Be warned, these prices might be... out of your range"</div>           <table><tr><th>Item</th><th>Cost</th></tr><h6>Weapon</h6><tr><td>Dagger</td><td> 2 Gold 2 b222814c-a23d-48e7-9f66-4472f87f2920.name: The Plunsed Distributors
b222814c-a23d-48e7-9f66-4472f87f2920.output: <span class="first-character">T</span>he Plunsed Distributors is a merchants guild. It's recently established, and the slightly above average sized faction has an excellent reputation, and is motivated by politics. They are rumoured to be under investigation.<br><h3>Policing</h3>Plunsed is policed by The Plunsed Distributors, rather than a separate guard. The guard is well funded, and armed according to budget. They have training exercises, and their officers are held accountable for their actions.<br>One can recognise a member of The Plunsed Distributors by the their purple robes.<br><h4>Law in Plunsed</h4>Law in Plunsed is punitive, and those that breach the laws can expect hard labor, incarceration, fines, or, in rare instances, execution.<br><h3>Governance</h3>It's ruled by     <span class="tip" id="b7c3a82b-cb6c-415c-8f56-2307d8379b26"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Galinndan Fox</a></span>, who was promoted by being the most powerful in the group. He is somewhat incompetent, and his position is stable. Bribes are scorned. <br><h3>Members</h3>Members of The Plunsed Distributors are identifiable by their purple robes. Membership requires some social status, and costs three hundred gold pieces, provided there's an empty slot. The initiation into The Plunsed Distributors involves a simple form to be filled.<br><br><div id="NPC"></div><br><div id="BuildingRelationshipsTable"> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3> <table> <tr>   <th>Name</th>   <th>Race</th>   <th>Occupation</th>   <th>Relationship</th> </tr>    <tr><td><span class="tip" id="b7c3a82b-cb6c-415c-8f56-2307d8379b26"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Galinndan Fox</a></span></td>   <td>Half-elf</td>   <td><span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">Merchant</span></td>   <td><span class="tip dotted" title="[object Object] is the leader of The Plunsed Distributors, and is somewhat incompetent.">Head of Faction</span></td></tr>  </table> </div></div><br><h3>Resources</h3>They have limitless resources.      A handful of favours     are jealously guarded, as are               a handful of gems,              a couple pouches of gold,              a handful of old favours,          and a significant number of magical trinkets. <br><h3>Politics</h3>The Plunsed Distributors have a handful of trusted allies;      A veritable army of assassins and a veritable army of rangers can be called on for aid.   <br><br>The Plunsed Distributors have a couple enemies;      A guild of assassins are the enemies of The Plunsed Distributors.

da94e2a5-0c73-494f-86e3-9077d7e6cbd7.name: The Wild of Plunsed
da94e2a5-0c73-494f-86e3-9077d7e6cbd7.output: <span class="first-character">T</span>he Wild of Plunsed is a druids grove. It's well established, and the slightly below average sized faction has an excellent reputation, and is motivated by growth of nature. They are distrusted by the people.<br><br><h3>Governance</h3>It's ruled by     a committee of 8, who were able to rise to power through nepotism. They are very competent, and their positions on the committee are somewhat unstable. Their meetings are held every week, and are closed and held in secret. Bribes to the committee are treated as insults.   <br><h3>Members</h3>Members of The Wild of Plunsed are identifiable by brown and dirty robes. Membership requires give up all worldly possessions, and costs ten gold pieces. The initiation into The Wild of Plunsed involves fight a bear with your bare hands.<br><br><div id="NPC"></div><br><div id="BuildingRelationshipsTable"> </div><br><h3>Resources</h3>They have limitless resources.      A chest of gold     are jealously guarded, as are               a fair few old favours,              one or two valuable magical trinkets,              one or two favours,          and a drawer of magic scrolls. <br><h3>Politics</h3>The Wild of Plunsed have a decent number of allies;      A veritable army of priests     will answer a call for aid, as will               a veritable army of wizards,          and a veritable army of monks. <br><br>The Wild of Plunsed have more enemies than one would expect;      A guild of assassins     wish ill of The Wild of Plunsed. Their other enemies also include               a guild of wizards,          and a guild of assassins.

b4b9722b-3aec-4dbb-8bf3-69d8808f0eeb.name: The All Seeing Society
b4b9722b-3aec-4dbb-8bf3-69d8808f0eeb.output: <span class="first-character">T</span>he All Seeing Society is a seers guild. It's recently established, and the above average sized faction has an above average reputation, and is motivated by knowledge. They are rumoured to own a powerful artifact.<br><br><h3>Governance</h3>It's ruled by     <span class="tip" id="cfd395d3-3628-4606-89f7-55823b923e98"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Vonana Rumnaheim</a></span>, who was able to rise to power by completing an ordeal. She is of mild competence, and her position is mostly stable. Bribes will never be accepted, and will be met with instant excommunication. <br><h3>Members</h3>Members of The All Seeing Society are identifiable by the bright blue coloured sashes they wear. Membership requires a display of skill, and costs a single gold piece. The initiation into The All Seeing Society involves a secret ritual.<br><br><div id="NPC"></div><br><div id="BuildingRelationshipsTable"> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3> <table> <tr>   <th>Name</th>   <th>Race</th>   <th>Occupation</th>   <th>Relationship</th> </tr>    <tr><td><span class="tip" id="cfd395d3-3628-4606-89f7-55823b923e98"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Vonana Rumnaheim</a></span></td>   <td>Dwarf</td>   <td><span class="tip dotted" title="Able to see what the future holds through supernatural insight.">Seer</span></td>   <td><span class="tip dotted" title="[object Object] is the leader of The All Seeing Society, and is of mild competence.">Head of Faction</span></td></tr>  </table> </div></div><br><h3>Resources</h3>They have limitless resources.      A significant number of trade goods     are jealously guarded, as are               sheafs of blackmail material,              a handful of artifacts,              a handful of magical weapons,          and one or two contacts. <br><h3>Politics</h3>The All Seeing Society have a considerable number of allies;      A veritable army of mercenaries     regularly assist The All Seeing Society. At their disposal, they also have               a veritable army of knights,              a veritable army of thieves,          and a veritable army of scholars. <br><br>The All Seeing Society have some enemies;      A guild of scholars and a guild of scholars are the only that wish The All Seeing Society ill.

c79923f6-c7af-4e11-89c1-0516453b97ff.name: Oewyn Burnside
c79923f6-c7af-4e11-89c1-0516453b97ff.output: <br><span class="first-character">O</span>ewyn Burnside is <span class="tip dotted" title="62 years old, to be exact.">a weathered</span> male human. He is <span class="tip dotted" title="5ft. 9″">medium sized</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="170lbs. (with a BMI of 25)">overweight</span>, and has brown eyes with fair skin. The most notable physical trait of Oewyn is that he has hair in thick long braids.<br><br>Oewyn corrects people's grammar when they speak. When he is relaxed, he is reserved. In moments of stress, he becomes meticulous. Religion-wise, Oewyn is a cautious listener. <br><br>Perhaps due to sexism, Oewyn is a <span class="tip dotted" title="A person belonging to a class with high social or political status.">noble</span>, with a background of being a noble. He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Oewyn lives a comfortable life, filled with good food and wine">nobility</span> social class. <br><br>Oewyn currently has 5 cp in his pockets, and  80 Gold 2 Silver 6 Copper to his name. Oewyn has a wife, <span class="tip" id="a2d3cad6-e11d-49ed-922c-a85ca9a33ff4"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Dalyla Dike</a></span>.<br>Oewyn currently earns  2 Gold 6 Silver 7 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 3 Gold 1 Silver 8 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 6 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 2 Gold 6 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Oewyn lives a comfortable life, filled with good food and wine">comfortable</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in a castle, and was raised by my single mother as an only child. I had a wealthy upbringing in a large house.  Others saw me as different, or strange, and so I had few companions.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a noble</div><div class="descriptive">"My family is filled with remarkable people. I hope to live up to their reputation. Nepotism may have had a small part to play for my current position, I'll admit. My loyalty to my sovereign is unwavering. If I can attain more power, I will be able to protect my family"</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I got honorable mention at a flower festival for my vibrant honeysuckle.        I forget exactly when, but at one point, I worked as a noble.<br>        Not to mention there was the time I went to a summer festival. While I was there, I saw an incredible troupe of dancing elves.<br>        Oh, and I can't forget the time I went on a journey to find an upside-down castle built into the side of a cliff. I really did make it there, but it was not what I was truly looking for. <br>        One time I saw a miracle- honest to god. This old man had told us that he was the physical aspect of a deity, and one of the boys did not believe him. Then, with a wave of his hand, the boy vanished.<br>        Oh, and I can't forget the time there were some goblin raids which I had to defend my town from. I managed to escape the battle unscathed, but many of my friends were killed or injured. <br>        Not to mention there was the time one time, I was part of a real miracle. An old woman once came into town claiming to be a god and told us she had cast a miracle on our town, but nobody believed them. That night silver rained down from the sky.<br>    At one point, I met the love of my life, [object Object].<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr> 2ada790f-2e0b-4c04-bc42-65312c373fac.name: Aramil March
2ada790f-2e0b-4c04-bc42-65312c373fac.output: <br><span class="first-character">A</span>ramil March is <span class="tip dotted" title="128 years old, to be exact.">an elderly</span> male half-elf. He is <span class="tip dotted" title="6ft. 4″">very tall</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="138lbs. (with a BMI of 16)">rather solidly built</span>, and has hazel eyes with fair skin. The most notable physical trait of Aramil is that he has very tiny feet.<br><br>Aramil is incredibly gullible. When he is relaxed, he is deceitful. In moments of stress, he becomes stubborn. Religion-wise, Aramil is a quiet true believer. <br><br>Aramil has recently been somewhat unsuccessful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Holding or seeking office in government.">politician</span>, with a background of being a noble. He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Aramil lives lavishly, with fine foods, wines, clothes, and all the comforts money can buy">nobility</span> social class. <br><br>Aramil currently has a golden yellow topaz gem worth 50gp in his pockets, and  3 Silver 5 Copper to his name. Aramil knows Common and Elvish. He is heterosexual with passing interest in other men, and has a wife, <span class="tip" id="47c7e1be-bbcb-4c59-a2ee-87cc1ca51af5"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Brooklinea Short</a></span>.<br>Aramil currently earns  7 Gold 1 Silver 2 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 8 Gold 4 Silver 8 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 6 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 7 Gold 1 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Aramil lives lavishly, with fine foods, wines, clothes, and all the comforts money can buy">wealthy</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 1 Silver 5 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in a cart, and was raised by my single mother, along with my 3 siblings. I had a wealthy upbringing in a village in the middle of the wilderness. One parent was a human, the other was an elf. I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a politician</div><div class="descriptive">"My family recently came by its title, and that elevation thrust us into a new and strange world. I thought that I could do a better job than the last guy. I was right. I will face any challenge to win the approval of my family. It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I once drank a strong potion- it made my nose glow in the dark for a week!        Once I spent a day at a holiday festival. While I was there, I saw an illusionist perform a card trick.<br>    At one point, I came across a famous poet while I was traveling.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3> 30276105-28d0-4359-9a1b-e65d8c9bfd08.output: <br><span class="first-character">J</span>anna Newby is <span class="tip dotted" title="88 years old, to be exact.">undefined</span> female human. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="5ft. 2″">rather short</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="175lbs. (with a BMI of 32)">rather round</span>, and has brown eyes with brown skin. The most notable physical trait of Janna is that she has incredibly crooked teeth.<br><br>Janna cannot resist a juicy secret. When she is relaxed, she is greedy. In moments of stress, she becomes impractical. Religion-wise, Janna is a casual observer. <br><br>Janna is a <span class="tip dotted" title="Pours drinks at taverns and other establishments.">bartender</span>, with a background of being a commoner. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Janna lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">peasantry</span> social class. <br><br>Janna currently has an empty flask in her pockets, and  80 Gold 1 Silver 5 Copper to her name. <br>Janna currently earns  1 Gold 9 Silver 4 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 2 Gold 1 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 8.5 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold 9 Silver 4 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Janna lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 4 Silver 1 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born on the Astral Plane, and was raised by my mother and father with my brother. I had a poor upbringing in no real permanent address.  I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a bartender</div><div class="descriptive">"I was one of many children, and had to work from a young age to support my family. My parents bought this place as an investment. I don't know what they were thinking- when have you ever heard of a pub being profitable? I was a nobleman once, but made the wrong man an enemy. I help the people who help me– that's what keeps us alive."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time because of a promise, I did some time as a commoner.        I was a novice to <span class="tip" id="1a6f1040-8937-4cd9-8d40-ac0c4595bca8"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Nataliae Ash</a></span> a legendary musician. During that time my master was gentle with their teachings.<br>        I'll always remember the time I was falsely accused of fraud, but eventually was acquitted. It took up years of my life, though, and I still get antsy around guards that I don't know.<br>        I'll always remember the time I was nearly caught and convicted in the middle of extortion, but managed to escape. They are still after me, though.<br>        Oh, and I can't forget the time I got to attend the royal banquet of a local <span class="tip" id="ae4d61c8-a984-4e81-9226-279eacc4ed61"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">noble</a></span> in celebration of the remembrance of a past ruler. <br>        At one point some friends and I went to an agriculture festival where I saw some enormous green beans. If I recall correctly, they got runner up in the growers competition.<br>    At one point, I saw the carriage of a <span class="tip" id="44def523-fcd0-487f-bad1-091430a2220d"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">noble</a></span> passing by my house, and it was being pulled by a single elephant.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr> dfaada86-727c-4a96-b0ae-e71fef2b4bb3.output: <br><span class="first-character">A</span>evelyn Martin is <span class="tip dotted" title="170 years old, to be exact.">a vulnerably elderly</span> female half-elf. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="6ft. 4″">very tall</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="106lbs. (with a BMI of 12)">bony</span>, and has red eyes with dark tan skin. The most notable physical trait of Aevelyn is that she has quite rounded shoulders.<br><br>Aevelyn swears often. When she is relaxed, she is reserved. In moments of stress, she becomes murderous. Religion-wise, Aevelyn is an open-minded seeker. <br><br>Aevelyn has recently been mildly successful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Serves drinks and food in a bar as well as engaging with customers.">barmaid</span>, with a background of being a commoner. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Aevelyn lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Aevelyn currently has fragments of a shattered sword in her pockets, and  200 Gold 9 Silver 4 Copper to her name. Aevelyn knows Common and Elvish. <br>Aevelyn currently earns  5 Silver 7 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 6 Silver 4 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 5 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Aevelyn lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">poor</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 3 Silver 1 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in an alley, and was raised by $currentNPC.familyUnit as an only child. One parent was a half-elf, the other was an elf. $currentNPC.childhoodMemories.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a barmaid</div><div class="descriptive">"I had a bad string of bets which left me with no other choice than to skip town. Bar work has been all that I have been able to find. I used to fear anyone who didn't look like me until some adventurers from distant lands saved my life. Now I want to see the whole world and the planes beyond. I'm going to prove that I'm worthy of a better life."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time there were some goblin raids which I had to defend my town from. I managed to escape the battle unscathed, but many of my friends were killed or injured.        One time some friends and I went to a grand festival. While I was there, I sang folk songs with the other festival goers.<br>        Not to mention there was the time I spent some time working as a commoner.<br>        Once I came across a famous artist when I was spending some time as a commoner.<br>        There was this one time, I was falsely accused of racketeering, but eventually was acquitted. It took up years of my life, though, and I still get antsy around guards that I don't know. <br>        I'll always remember the time I did a stint as a barmaid.<br>        There was a pretty nasty zombie outbreak which I had to defend my town against. I suffered only minor injuries, and the wounds all healed without leaving any scars.<br>        Once I came across a trinket in a field- It's a Vital Linen Handkerchief of Blessings.<blockquote><h4>Vital Linen Handkerchief of Blessings</h4>The bearer's maximum hit points increases by their constitution modifier while attuned to this item. These hit points are lost when the bearer unattunes the item. Whenever bearer of this item receives divine healing, they gain an additional 1d4 hit points.</blockquote><br>        At one point there was a pretty nasty zombie outbreak which I had to defend my town against. I suffered only minor injuries, and the wounds all healed without leaving any scars.<br>        Once I was falsely accused of extortion, but eventually was acquitted. 84d9e954-788e-4a31-b0c4-ea9240a5952f.output: <h1>     Aisiah Hall</h1>      —  <select id="listbox-currentnpcoutputoption" name="listbox-currentnpcoutputoption" tabindex="0" class="macro-listbox"><option value="0">JSON</option><option value="1">GMBinder</option><option value="2">LegendKeeper</option></select> —     <br>Aisiah Hall was a <span class="tip dotted" title="174 years old, to be exact.">a vulnerably elderly</span> male half-elf. He was <span class="tip dotted" title="6ft. ">tall</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="170lbs. (with a BMI of 23)">overweight</span>, and had hazel eyes with fair skin. The most notable physical trait of Aisiah was that he had swollen, red knuckles.<br>Aisiah exaggerates details. When he was relaxed, he was dour. In moments of stress, he became practical. Aisiah knew Common and Elvish.<br>Aisiah was a paladin, with a background of being an acolyte. Aisiah had 22 cp in his pockets at his time of death, and  7 Silver 9 Copper to his name. <br><br><h6>Death</h6><br>Aisiah died from an infection from a broken leg. He was buried in a mass grave.<br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">Aisiah was born on the Ethereal Plane, and was raised by my single mother as an only child. $currentNPC.pronouns.heshe.toUpperFirst() had a wealthy upbringing in a mansion. Both parents were half-elves. I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a paladin</div><div class="descriptive">"An impassioned sermon struck a chord deep in me, and compelled me to serve the faith. I served as a paladin's squire, and admired his honesty and conduct. I decided to follow in his footsteps, and champion the good and decency that he represented. Everything I do is for the common people. I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith's religious hierarchy."</div><br><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr>       <th>Name</th>       <th>Race</th> e9aec756-060c-4ae0-bb10-64310707d4d1.output: <br><span class="first-character">F</span>ranklin Tallfellow is <span class="tip dotted" title="56 years old, to be exact.">a middle aged</span> male halfling. He is <span class="tip dotted" title="3ft. 1″">diminutive</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="29lbs. (with a BMI of 14)">bony</span>, and has green eyes with pale skin. The most notable physical trait of Franklin is that he has a thin dainty chin.<br><br>Franklin bobs head back and forth when speaking. When he is relaxed, he is cautious. In moments of stress, he becomes practical. Religion-wise, Franklin is an outspoken believer. <br><br>Franklin is an <span class="tip dotted" title="Transforms or creates something within nature through the magical and scientific manipulation of chemicals.">alchemist</span>, with a background of being a sage. He belongs to the commoner social class, but lives large, with little care to how much money is spent, splashing out on expensive things on a whim. <br><br>Franklin currently has 6 sp in his pockets, and  8 Silver 3 Copper to his name. Franklin knows Common and Halfling. <br>Franklin currently earns  14 Gold 1 Silver 5 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 15 Gold 9 Silver</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 14 Gold 1 Silver 5 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Franklin lives large, with little care to how much money is spent, splashing out on expensive things on a whim">aristocratic</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>          <tr><td>Money owed to <span class="tip" id="b653d40f-6009-4db8-95a4-a0e6adf3bf3f"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Androe Head</a></span></td><td> 114 Gold 3 Silver 9 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born at home, and was raised by my adoptive family as an only child. I had a comfortable upbringing in a large house. I didn't know my parents growing up. I had several friends, and my childhood was generally a happy one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming an alchemist</div><div class="descriptive">"I was always an avid reader, and became a sage to learn more from the thousands of books that I tended to. I'm working as an alchemist. The work is alright, if a little dull at times I sold my soul for knowledge; I hope to do great deeds and win it back. Knowledge is, in my opinion, the path to power and domination."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...<br>     This one time I had a mishap with a mind control spell- someone I thought of as family tried to force me to hand over all my money, but they were eventually caught by some brave adventurers. He is <span class="tip dotted" title="6ft. 1″">reasonably tall</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="168lbs. (with a BMI of 22)">overweight</span>, and has green eyes and a neckbeard, with light tan skin. The most notable physical trait of Androe is that he has hair greased into a ducktail.<br><br>Androe often sniffs audibly. When he is relaxed, he is devout. In moments of stress, he becomes compulsive. Religion-wise, Androe is a cautious listener. <br><br>Androe is a <span class="tip dotted" title="Bets money on sports, card games, or games of chance in the hope of a profit.">gambler</span>, with a background of being a folk hero. He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Androe lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">peasantry</span> social class. <br><br>Androe currently has a sling with 10 bullets in his pockets, and  70 Gold 9 Silver 3 Copper to his name. <br>Androe currently earns  1 Gold 2 Silver 6 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 3 Silver 8 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 8.5 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold 2 Silver 6 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Androe lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>               <tr><td>Money owed by <span class="tip" id="e9aec756-060c-4ae0-bb10-64310707d4d1"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Franklin Tallfellow</a></span></td><td> 114 Gold 3 Silver 9 Copper</td></tr>      </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born at home, and was raised by $currentNPC.familyUnit with my brother. Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...<br>    When I was younger, I witnessed a miracle once- Honest to god. edc0feb4-634f-42d3-a651-d80cd084455e.name: Jarana Deepdelver
edc0feb4-634f-42d3-a651-d80cd084455e.output: <br><span class="first-character">J</span>arana Deepdelver is <span class="tip dotted" title="147 years old, to be exact.">an old</span> female dwarf. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="3ft. 11″">somewhat tiny</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="141lbs. (with a BMI of 31)">quite fat</span>, and has hazel eyes and a well-groomed beard going down to his chest, with light tan skin. The most notable physical trait of Jarana is that she has a narrow jawline that arrows into a pointed chin.<br><br>Jarana paces about incessantly. When she is relaxed, she is devout. In moments of stress, she becomes withdrawn. Religion-wise, Jarana is an open-minded seeker. <br><br>Jarana has been somewhat unsuccessful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Performs duties for others, especially a person employed in a house or as a personal attendant.">servant</span>, with a background of being an outlander. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Jarana lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">paupery</span> social class. <br><br>Jarana currently has a scrap of paper with unintelligible writing on it in her pockets, and  170 Gold 7 Silver 1 Copper to her name. Jarana knows Common and Dwarvish. She is mostly homosexual, but with more than a passing interest in the opposite sex<br>Jarana currently earns  9 Silver 4 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 6 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 9 Silver 4 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Jarana lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">poor</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 6 Silver 3 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in a rubbish heap, and was raised by my mother and father, along with my 6 siblings. I had a poor upbringing in a rundown shack.  I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a servant</div><div class="descriptive">"I came to understand the darkness that lurks in the wilds, and l vowed to combat it. Being a servant was all the work that I could find. An injury to the unspoiled wilderness of my home is an injury to me. I believe that the strongest are meant to rule."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I came across a famous wizard in my travels.        There was no other work so for a while I was a servant.<br>        I worked under <span class="tip" id="dadb1757-17c2-4890-9c28-a4c3f423ce92"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Santegus Hume</a></span> an adept cooper. During that time I learned a lot about myself.<br>        There was this one time, there was a minor skirmish with some orcs that I was involved with. I acquitted myself well in battle, and was awarded a medal for bravery. <br>        You might not believe it, but for a while I did some work as a servant.<br>        Oh, and I can't forget the time I met a <span class="tip" id="758fdbe2-04a9-42c3-9d30-5828e3efdf9e"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span>, and we played cards. He decided that I was cheating- I'll never say what really happened. That's all behind me now and I hope it stays that way. <br>        There was this one time, one time, I was part of a real miracle. My friends and I once came upon a snake who was trapped beneath a rock and we helped it out. The snake spoke to us and said a miracle would befall us soon, and I was the only one who did not believe them. Overnight a statue of an unknown god appeared in the center of town. <br>    At one point, to pay off a debt, I had to work as a outlander.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable"> 5f19b5ba-e315-49e9-8fd4-5bcc9bd15a61.name: Urshar Fahack
5f19b5ba-e315-49e9-8fd4-5bcc9bd15a61.output: <br><span class="first-character">U</span>rshar Fahack is <span class="tip dotted" title="138 years old, to be exact.">a middle aged</span> female dwarf. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="4ft. 3″">quite squat</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="165lbs. (with a BMI of 31)">obese</span>, and has brown eyes with brown skin. The most notable physical trait of Urshar is that she has a chunk of right ear missing.<br><br>Urshar drinks too much. When she is relaxed, she is weak-willed. In moments of stress, she becomes gluttonous. Religion-wise, Urshar is a critical student. <br><br>Urshar is mildly successful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="A pickpocket or thief.">cutpurse</span>, with a background of being an urchin. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Urshar lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">peasantry</span> social class. <br><br>Urshar currently has lacy undergarments in her pockets, and  4 Silver 6 Copper to her name. Urshar knows Common and Dwarvish. <br>Urshar currently earns  9 Silver 7 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 6 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 8.5 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 9 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Urshar lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">poor</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 6 Silver 6 Copper</td></tr>               <tr><td>Money owed by <span class="tip" id="08dd4909-e7f2-4f62-bd93-e480e2c9cdd6"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Gianna Gross</a></span></td><td> 8 Gold 7 Silver 6 Copper</td></tr>      </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born at home, and was raised by my mother and father, along with my 2 siblings. I had a squalid upbringing in a large house.  I had several friends, and my childhood was generally a happy one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a cutpurse</div><div class="descriptive">"My family was swindled, and we lost everything we had. I had to beg on the streets to look after my family. I'm on the upswing as a cutpurse. Things are looking better. I owe a debt I can never repay to the person who took pity on me. All people deserve respect."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I ventured out to see the battlegrounds of a long over war near the peak of a mountain. My journey was a failure, but I still made some new friends along the way.        At one point I was caught aiding and abetting the crime of smuggling, but due to being forced to do it against my will, I was found not guilty.<br>        There was a minor skirmish with some orcs that I was involved with. I was knocked out, and left for dead. I woke up hours later, after the battle was over, and had to walk injured for days to find aid.<br>        I used to play cards in a pub, and one time supposedly cheated a <span class="tip" id="a0af6ed8-248b-42dc-aa23-868e2f077368"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span> out of his winnings; I'm ashamed to admit that I'm to blame. He hunts me to this day.<br>        You might not believe it, but I worked under <span class="tip" id="b32a6863-1e47-4033-a4d5-08d33cd5fcda"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Olivya Short</a></span> an incredibly talented chemist. During that time my master taught me many things.<br>        I forget exactly when, but at one point, I met a well known hero while on a long journey.<br>        At one point my friends and I went on a long journey to a mountain made of crystals in an icy tundra. My journey was a failure, but I came out of the journey a better person.<br>        After that, I was framed by a <span class="tip" id="31ecc521-9168-4cc3-8b5c-05b397778edf"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">scoundrel</a></span> for a crime I didn't commit- I'm ashamed to admit that I'm to blame. I would rather have backup the next time that I face him.<br>    At one point, I worked under <span class="tip" id="2be71a7d-d3cd-41eb-a5fa-8a72c0d9dff6"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Lucius March</a></span> an adept chemist. During that time I realized I could never match my master.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr>       <th>Name</th>       <th>Race</th> c7fd8fd6-1c63-4195-8f67-fe213eaf1cf7.output: <br><span class="first-character">T</span>herlin Bofdarm is <span class="tip dotted" title="118 years old, to be exact.">a middle aged</span> female dwarf. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="4ft. ">somewhat tiny</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="155lbs. (with a BMI of 33)">quite solidly built</span>, and has blue eyes with light skin. The most notable physical trait of Therlin is that she has no earlobes.<br><br>Therlin is a habitual liar. When she is relaxed, she is eager. In moments of stress, she becomes destructive. Religion-wise, Therlin is a casual observer. <br><br>Therlin is currently having reasonable success as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Makes, alters, repairs, as well as occasionally designing garments.">tailor</span>, with a background of being an acolyte. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Therlin lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">peasantry</span> social class. <br><br>Therlin currently has 7 sp in her pockets, and  70 Gold 6 Silver 7 Copper to her name. Therlin knows Common and Dwarvish. <br>Therlin currently earns  9 Silver 7 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 6 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 8.5 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 9 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Therlin lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">poor</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 6 Silver 6 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in the home of a midwife, and was raised by my mother and father as an only child. I had a poor upbringing in a large house.  I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a tailor</div><div class="descriptive">"I ran away from home at a young age, and found refuge in a temple. I'm doing really well as a tailor! Maybe it's luck, maybe a natural talent, I don't know. Everything I do is for the common people. I believe that the ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I met the love of my life, who is no longer with me.        Not to mention there was the time I had a child, <span class="tip" id="fd792891-07ea-4841-a82a-1d8aacfb263a"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Kildrak Bofdarm</a></span> with my dear partner, who is no longer with me.<br>        Oh, and I can't forget the time I was caught aiding and abetting the crime of kidnapping, but due to being forced to do it against my will, I was found not guilty. <br>        How could I ever forget the time I had a child, <span class="tip" id="fd792891-07ea-4841-a82a-1d8aacfb263a"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Kildrak Bofdarm</a></span> with my dear partner, who is no longer with me. <br>        You might not believe it, but A dying noble gave me a Trickster's Cloth Doll of Tongues.<blockquote><h4>Trickster's Cloth Doll of Tongues</h4>The bearer may cast Minor Illusion once per day. Contains 1d4 unreplenishable charges of the Comprehend Languages spell.</blockquote><br>        There was this one time, when I was young I got lost in an elven ruin and I can not remember how long I was there. I was found by a panicked wizard but have been haunted by that experience. <br>        There was this one time, I ventured out to see a tower of knowledge in a white sand desert. My journey was a failure, and to be honest I have given up on ever going there. <br>        You might not believe it, but I did a stint as a tailor.<br>        One time for a time, I worked for a famous gladiator when I was spending some time as a acolyte.<br>    At one point, I had a child, <span class="tip" id="fd792891-07ea-4841-a82a-1d8aacfb263a"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" In moments of stress, he becomes courageous. Religion-wise, Galinndan is a casual observer. <br><br>Galinndan is a <span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">merchant</span>, with a background of being a charlatan. He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Galinndan lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Galinndan currently has thirteen mouse teeth in his pockets, and  220 Gold 8 Silver to his name. I spent most of my childhood alone, and had no close friends.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a merchant</div><div class="descriptive">"I often got into trouble as a youngster, but talked my way out of it. I love gold. Unashamedly, I really do. So what? Selling is an honest living. Sue me. I fleeced the wrong person, a lord called Charlus, and must work to ensure that he never crosses paths with me or those I care about. I am a free spirit– no one tells me what to do."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I went on a journey to find a city of elves in a forest. cfd395d3-3628-4606-89f7-55823b923e98.name: Vonana Rumnaheim
cfd395d3-3628-4606-89f7-55823b923e98.output: <br><span class="first-character">V</span>onana Rumnaheim is <span class="tip dotted" title="179 years old, to be exact.">an elderly</span> female dwarf. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="4ft. 2″">rather squat</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="165lbs. (with a BMI of 33)">rather round</span>, and has yellow eyes and a goatee, with translucent skin. The most notable physical trait of Vonana is that she has short, stubby arms.<br><br>Vonana fidgets. When she is relaxed, she is reserved. In moments of stress, she becomes stubborn. Religion-wise, Vonana is a cautious listener. <br><br>Vonana is currently having reasonable success as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Able to see what the future holds through supernatural insight.">seer</span>, with a background of being a sage. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Vonana lives a comfortable life, filled with good food and wine">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Vonana currently has a headhunter's contract in her pockets, and  130 Gold 6 Silver 1 Copper to her name. Vonana knows Common and Dwarvish. Vonana has a husband, <span class="tip" id="04cff947-3a7a-4677-886a-61e5b16ea22e"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Rurik Steelfist</a></span>.<br>Vonana currently earns  3 Gold 7 Silver 7 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 4 Gold 2 Silver 4 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 3 Gold 7 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Vonana lives a comfortable life, filled with good food and wine">comfortable</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 5 Silver</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in a temple, and was raised by my mother and father, along with my 2 siblings. I had a modest upbringing in a small house.  I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a seer</div><div class="descriptive">"I was always an avid reader, and became a sage to learn more from the thousands of books that I tended to. I'm doing really well as a seer! Maybe it's luck, maybe a natural talent, I don't know. I work to preserve a library, university, scriptorium, or monastery. What is beautiful points us beyond itself toward what is true."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I did a stint as a sage.        Oh, and I can't forget the time I met a <span class="tip" id="8ef57690-37d2-4ae8-a0d3-8b1fec62eb43"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span>, and we played cards. He decided that I was cheating- it was a misunderstanding, but I cannot convince him otherwise. I hope to apologise to him if I ever encounter him again. <br>        One time I used to play cards in a pub, and one time supposedly cheated a <span class="tip" id="784ba523-4868-4934-9626-368ee5810818"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span> out of his winnings; it was a misunderstanding, but I cannot convince him otherwise. I'm afraid that he'll kill me in my sleep.<br>        Oh, and I can't forget the time I was caught and convicted of extortion, and spent 4 years doing hard labour before managing to escape. <br>        Once I had the honor to go to the royal masquerade ball hosted by a local <span class="tip" id="35b0f5f7-4eb0-4db8-b63c-308fd92e67b3"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">noble</a></span> in honor of the end of a recent war.<br>        I forget exactly when, but at one point, because of a promise, I did some time as a sage.<br>        Not to mention there was the time I once drank a kind of weak potion- everyone thought I was attractive for the rest of the day.<br>        One time I was on a long journey when I found a Sparkling Padlock of Vigilance.<blockquote><h4>Sparkling Padlock of Vigilance</h4>The bearer may cast Dancing Lights once per day. The bearer gains +2 to their Passive Perception.</blockquote><br>        There was this one time, I met the love of my life, who is no longer with me. <br>        I'll always remember the time I once saw a true miracle. My town was told by a passing prophet that a miracle was coming, and we all rejoiced. Overnight a statue of an unknown god appeared in the center of town.<br>    At one point, I met a famous crime boss when I was spending some time as a sage.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable"> 6ae453a0-f314-4fda-aa57-91bc0b4259f9.name: Buvvie Miggledy
6ae453a0-f314-4fda-aa57-91bc0b4259f9.output: <br><span class="first-character">B</span>uvvie Miggledy is <span class="tip dotted" title="278 years old, to be exact.">a weathered</span> female gnome. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="3ft. 2″">diminutive</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="35lbs. (with a BMI of 17)">scrawny</span>, and has yellow eyes with dark tan skin. The most notable physical trait of Buvvie is that she has a scar down the forehead.<br><br>Buvvie bobs head back and forth when speaking. When she is relaxed, she is loyal. In moments of stress, she becomes pushy. Religion-wise, Buvvie is a casual observer. <br><br>Despite sexism against her, Buvvie has been successful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">merchant</span>, with a background of being a commoner. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Buvvie lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Buvvie currently has a clove of garlic in her pockets, and  7 Silver 3 Copper to her name. Buvvie knows Common and Gnomish. <br>Buvvie currently earns  1 Gold 1 Silver 3 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 2 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold 1 Silver 3 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Buvvie lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in the home of a friend, and was raised by my single mother with my brother. I had a wealthy upbringing in a large house.  I had several friends, and my childhood was generally a happy one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a merchant</div><div class="descriptive">"I was one of many children, and had to work from a young age to support my family. I love gold. Unashamedly, I really do. So what? Selling is an honest living. Sue me. My home was a simple one, but it had a certain charm about it. An arsonist burnt it down, and I intend to catch them. The low are lifted up"</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I went to a grand festival. While I was there, I drank deeply and merrily.        Once I was caught and convicted of racketeering, and spent 4 years chained to an oar before being released.<br>        I'll always remember the time I made an <span class="tip" id="72bb086b-1589-4c7e-b55c-924ad8236222"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">enemy</a></span> for life in my travels- I'll freely admit that I'm to blame. He hunts me to this day.<br>        There was this one time, there was a small skirmish with a rivaling faction that I was drafted into. I suffered some serious injuries, and had to be carried off the field. <br>        I'll always remember the time I ventured out to see the burial tomb of an ancient ruler in a white sand desert. My journey was successful, and I like to think I became a better person from the trek.<br>    At one point, I was on a long journey when I found a Healing Staff of Coercion.<blockquote><h4>Healing Staff of Coercion</h4>This item contains 4 weak healing nodes. As an action, a character can use one node to heal 1d4 hit points at touch range. The item regains 1d4 charges at sunrise. The bearer gains a +1 bonus to Charisma (Intimidation) checks if the target can see this item.</blockquote><br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr> I never target people who can't afford to lose a few coins."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time while I was still a kid I got lost in a birch tree forest for weeks. f016a588-061f-4fb4-9c1b-1036a3bc7e38.name: Thomys Lamb
f016a588-061f-4fb4-9c1b-1036a3bc7e38.output: <br><span class="first-character">T</span>homys Lamb is <span class="tip dotted" title="48 years old, to be exact.">a middle aged</span> male human. He is <span class="tip dotted" title="6ft. 3″">rather tall</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="160lbs. (with a BMI of 19)">skinny</span>, and has pale brown eyes and a long, well-kempt beard, with pale skin. The most notable physical trait of Thomys is that he has a cat-like nose.<br><br>Thomys cannot resist a juicy secret. When he is relaxed, he is funny. In moments of stress, he becomes brave. Religion-wise, Thomys is a casual observer. <br><br>Thomys is a <span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">merchant</span>, with a background of being a charlatan. He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Thomys lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Thomys currently has an invitation to a wedding that happened a few weeks ago in his pockets, and  70 Gold 6 Silver 5 Copper to his name. <br>Thomys currently earns  1 Gold 1 Silver 3 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 2 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold 1 Silver 3 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Thomys lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in a cave, and was raised by my single mother as an only child. I had a modest upbringing in a large house.  I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a merchant</div><div class="descriptive">"After a charlatan fleeced my family, I decided to learn all the tricks I could so I would never fall for another scam. Some people just have the gift of the gab- I have a talent for sales. I fleeced the wrong person, a lord called Oscoe, and must work to ensure that he never crosses paths with me or those I care about. I distribute the money I acquire to the people who really need it."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time as a young child I got lost in a deep cavern for years. I eventually found a hero out on an adventure but not before I hurt myself trying to get home.        I'll always remember the time I went on a pilgrimage in penance to a holy landmark of my god. I had waited my whole life for this, and my peers have respected me more since I returned.<br>        I shook the hand of a passing <span class="tip" id="07130549-af3e-4730-b228-e886fcf24e7d"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">noble</a></span>. If I recall their handshake was a little too firm.<br>        How could I ever forget the time a group of travelers and I went to find a city of dwarves in an icy tundra. My journey was a failure, and honestly I think the place may not exist. <br>    At one point, because of a promise, I did some time as a charlatan.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable"> Religion-wise, Tharivol is an open-minded seeker. <br><br>Tharivol has recently been mildly successful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">merchant</span>, with a background of being an urchin. I love gold. Unashamedly, I really do. So what? Selling is an honest living. Sue me. My town is my home, and I'll fight to defend it. The low are lifted up, and we all benefit from that."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I was a guest in the court of a <span class="tip" id="b22e855a-a91f-48d6-89ec-626a99bccfde"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">lord</a></span>, and made an embarrassment of him- I'm ashamed to admit that I'm to blame. I was found by a city guard and have carried a compass ever since.<br>        Oh, and I can't forget the time there was no other work so for a while I was a urchin. <br>        Not to mention there was the time when I was young I got lost in a cedar tree forest for days. I found my own way back but not before I hurt myself trying to get home.<br>        One time I met the love of my life, who is no longer with me.<br>    At one point, I had a child, <span class="tip" id="87d858f4-8f58-43ad-b114-cb72df1e56c2"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Amy Holimion</a></span> with my dear partner, who is no longer with me.<br></div><br> <div He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Bertus lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">peasantry</span> social class. <br><br>Bertus currently has a silver pearl worth 10gp in his pockets, and  5 Silver 4 Copper to his name. <br>Bertus currently earns  9 Silver 7 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 6 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 8.5 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 9 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Bertus lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">poor</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 6 Silver 6 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born among people of a different race, and was raised by my extended family with my brother. I had a poor upbringing in a mansion.  I spent most of my childhood alone, and had no close friends.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a farmer</div><div class="descriptive">"I had a bad string of bets which left me with no other choice than to skip town. I'm on the upswing as a farmer. Things are looking better. A witch-doctor had claimed to be able to cure my baby. The bastard had lied, and he died at just six weeks. I'll find him one day, and make him wish he had never been born. I help the people who help me– that's what keeps us alive."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...<br>    When I was younger, I met a <span class="tip" id="95e6de9e-88e4-4ac7-8a67-3ae145b10619"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span>, and we played cards. He decided that I was cheating- I'm not quite sure what happened. I hope to apologise to him if I ever encounter him again.
