3a28bfd6-85fe-411e-a75f-e8425a268c13.name: Jarsali Floshern
3a28bfd6-85fe-411e-a75f-e8425a268c13.output: <br><span class="first-character">J</span>arsali Floshern is <span class="tip dotted" title="539 years old, to be exact.">an old</span> female elf. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="5ft. 11″">taller than average</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="134lbs. (with a BMI of 18)">rather solidly built</span>, and has aqua eyes with tan skin. The most notable physical trait of Jarsali is that she has a quite slender chin.<br><br>Jarsali exaggerates details. When she is relaxed, she is fun-loving. In moments of stress, she becomes pushy. Religion-wise, Jarsali is a quiet true believer. <br><br>Jarsali has recently been slightly unsuccessful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Unlawfully occupies an uninhabited building or unused land.">squatter</span>, with a background of being a hermit. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Jarsali lives a squalid existence, eating terrible food with no alcohol, and few creature comforts">paupery</span> social class. <br><br>Jarsali currently has a pair of bloodstained gloves in her pockets, and  40 Gold 4 Silver 7 Copper to her name. Jarsali knows Common and Elvish. <br>Jarsali currently earns  1 Silver 4 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Silver 6 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Silver 4 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Jarsali lives a squalid existence, eating terrible food with no alcohol, and few creature comforts">squalid</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 3 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born at home, and was raised by my single mother with my brother. I had a squalid upbringing in a rundown shack.  Others saw me as different, or strange, and so I had few companions.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a squatter</div><div class="descriptive">"I find myself in love with nature, and prefer the company of the animals and plants to that of people. I've had a bit of a downturn as a squatter. If it keeps up for much longer, I'm going to begin losing hope. I entered seclusion to hide from the ones who might still be hunting me. I must someday confront them. I believe that meddling in the affairs of others only causes trouble."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I met up with an adventurer who generously gave me a Grim Tankard of Shade.<blockquote><h4>Grim Tankard of Shade</h4>The bearer gains a +1 bonus to Charisma (Intimidation) checks if the target can see this item. The bearer suffers no harm in temperatures as high as 120 degrees Fahrenheit.</blockquote>        I was caught aiding and abetting the crime of counterfeiting, but due to my amazing lawyer, I was found not guilty.<br>        I forget exactly when, but at one point, there was no other work so for a while I was a squatter.<br>        After that, I was falsely accused of counterfeiting, but eventually was acquitted. It took up years of my life, though, and I still get antsy around guards that I don't know.<br>        You might not believe it, but when I was young I got lost in a dwarven ruin and I can not remember how long I was there. I was found by a gentle barbarian but not before I was roughed up by some bandits I ran into.<br>        At one point I worked under <span class="tip" id="37d96460-f543-4157-892f-7a6651d10602"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Ximena Preacher</a></span> an incredibly talented cook. During that time my master beat their teachings into me.<br>    At one point, I used to play cards in a pub, and one time supposedly cheated a <span class="tip" id="3d137c4c-d78a-418d-a007-5080697fae2b"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span> out of his winnings; it was all a setup, but a very good one. I would rather have backup the next time that I face him.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr>       <th>Name</th>       <th>Race</th> In moments of stress, he becomes courageous.
